Docs.summary: Provides the command adapter class for the cHTML adapter set. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This class requires a form tag for form submission. Since cHTML devices do not support JavaScript, they cannot render links for postbacks.
